video_prompt: Ancient tree city lights flicker amongst swirling cosmic nebulae. Elevated walkways subtly shift with unseen inhabitants. Golden window glows pulse. Clouds drift through the fantastical sky.
image_prompt: Fantastical digital art: Ancient civilization built around/within a colossal, gnarled tree, featuring East Asian-inspired architecture with warm lights. Under a mesmerizing, glowing blue and cyan starry sky with swirling nebulae. Elevated perspective, highly detailed.
refined_video_prompt: Lights flicker throughout the tree city. Cosmic nebulae swirl dynamically. Elevated walkways subtly shift, hinting at unseen presences. Golden window glows pulse rhythmically. Clouds drift steadily across the scene.
